Package org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.core.nodes

Interface RangeQueryNode<T extends FieldValuePairQueryNode<?>>

All Superinterfaces:
FieldableNode, QueryNode
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRangeQueryNode, PointRangeQueryNode, TermRangeQueryNode
public interface RangeQueryNode<T extends FieldValuePairQueryNode<?>> extends FieldableNode
This interface should be implemented by a QueryNode that represents some kind of range query.
